roleset.name: complain ineffectually
roleset.note: CARP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'carp' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from carp.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: carpe diem: fish of the day
example.text: Rivals carp at ``the principle of Pilson,'' as NBC's Arthur Watson once put it -- ``he's always expounding that rights are too high, then he's going crazy.''
